item.title: Project
item.description: Never forget – always play. Akamu is Open Source.  Take a look at the code. Learn more about Akamu Imagine if there was an app with which you could easily repeat your studies ... ... and compete with your fellow students. That exists! At Akamu you duel with other students on the topics of your studies and thus keep important contents in your memory for a long time. Our Vision Encourage students to engage with what they have learned through innovation and technology - in a fun and accessible way.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy This page is hosted by GitHub: GitHub's Privacy Statement

item.title: Contribute
item.description: CONTRIBUTE Our platform is developed by students for students. The Akamu e.V. university group of TU Darmstadt allows students to gain practical experience while they use their abilities to collaborate on something valuable. You can participate in the following areas: Content Creation Questions and Titles PR Social Media, Talks, Events UI und UX Design App, Website, Flyers and Posters Game Design Game Development, Gamification, Extension Software Development App Android and iOS development in Flutter Software Development

item.title: Donate
item.description: DONATE We want Akamu to be independent and accessible to all. Therefore, we rely on donations to pay the running costs of the platform and the organization. If you want to support us financially, please contact us via mail: team[at]akamu.de

item.title: Team
item.description: THE AKAMU TEAM Our team is proud to be involved in the design of modern education. Get to know us! Alex Kraft Content Creation & Design Alexandra Skogseide Backend Development Amin Kettani Vice President Mobile Development Antonia Wüst Content Creation Management & Development Bennet Wittelsbach President PR & Communication Julien Schröter Backend Development Maurice Kraus Mobile Development Max Granzow Fullstack Development Niklas Fix Mobile Development Simon Metzler System Administration

item.title: App Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy - Akamu App as of March 25, 2022 Did you know that Akamu collects personal data from you? Akamu doesn't work without personal data. Akamu stores your university, your username and how to reach you by email. We use Firebase Crashlytics for automatic crash reports. Only if you want, you can agree to enable Crashlytics on your device at the end of our privacy policy. Only with your consent to the Privacy Policy we can use your data legitimately.
